item.title: Why Did I Serve?
item.description: It breaks my heart to write these words. I spent 11 years in the U.S. Navy. I thought the long hours, the humiliation, the lousy pay, and missing the 1980s was worth it. I thought my country appreciated our work. Apparently, I was wrong: Zogby Poll: 51% of Americans Want Congress to Probe Bush/Cheney Regarding 9/11 Attacks; Over 30% Seek Immediate Impeachment If I believed this poll be accurate, I really wouldn’t want to be an American any longer.
